description: Di-air is the series` tritagonist, a seven-year-old girl recruited as an ES member candidate, apprenticing under Ascoeur and Q-feuille. Her past is shrouded in a mystery even she does not know, but is implied it was a life of perpetual darkness. Although her hair seems adorned by hair clips, she can twitch them at will like ears. Her special ability allows her to increase the magnitude of other people`s abilities, through a lips-to-lips kiss.
name: Di-air
